name: CLEMASZ

indications.text: clemasz ™ ( clemastine fumarate tablets usp ) 2.68 mg indicated relief symptoms associated allergic rhinitis sneezing , rhinorrhea , pruritus , lacrimation . clemasz ™ ( clemastine fumarate tablets usp ) 2.68 mg also indicated relief mild , uncomplicated allergic skin manifestations urticaria angioedema . noted clemastine fumarate indicated dermatologic 2.68 mg level .

warningsAndPrecautions: clemasz ™ ( clemastine fumarate tablets , usp ) 2.68 mg white , round , scored tablets debossed `` nh `` `` 268 `` . tablets packaged bottles 30 ( ndc 84044-268-03 ) .
indications_original: CLEMASZ ™ (Clemastine Fumarate Tablets USP) 2.68 mg are indicated for the relief of symptoms associated with allergic rhinitis such as sneezing, rhinorrhea, pruritus, and lacrimation. CLEMASZ ™ (Clemastine Fumarate Tablets USP) 2.68 mg are also indicated for the relief of mild, uncomplicated allergic skin manifestations of urticaria and angioedema. It should be noted that clemastine fumarate is indicated for the dermatologic indications at the 2.68 mg dosage level only.
contraindications_original: DOSAGE SHOULD BE INDIVIDUALIZED ACCORDING TO THE NEEDS AND RESPONSE OF THE PATIENT.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: CLEMASZ ™ (Clemastine Fumarate Tablets, USP) 2.68 mg are white, round, scored tablets debossed with "NH" and "268". Tablets are packaged in bottles of 30 (NDC 84044-268-03).
